short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Boost your academic success with ScholarPal Academics, the Chrome extension designed for students.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Meet ScholarPal ✐📚🧠, your ultimate AI homework buddy designed to supercharge your College/University experience! 

🚨We get it university is tough for students due to the demanding coursework, tight deadlines, and the challenge of balancing academics with personal responsibilities! Thats why ScholarPal provides instant, step-by-step solutions with just A Snapshot or Highlight, you can gain insight and deep understanding for any question, unlocking instant knowledge!

🔥Join over 4000+ Canadian and American Colleges/Universities and discover why ScholarPal is the #1 Study Companion!

🔑ScholarPal Key Features:

🎓 (Any Subject, Any Level)
📌ScholarPal provides instant solutions for a wide range of problems such as multiple choice, short and long answer, select all that apply, math problems and fill in the blank.With just one click of a button, gain instant access to accurate answers and in-depth explanations for any question!

💻 (24/7 Accessibility)
📌Available anytime, anywhere, ensuring help is always at hand!

👩🏻‍💻 (Convenience)
📌A reliable academic companion that fits seamlessly into a student's lifestyle!

🏆 (Long-Term Success) 
📌Helps build better study habits and achieve lasting academic success!

📚 (How To Use) 
1️⃣ Install the extension: 
📍Click the "Add to Chrome" button and pin it to the toolbar so its easily accessible.
2️⃣ Log In/Sign Up: 
✍️Sign in to your account on ScholarPal.ca OR sign up.
3️⃣ Start Using:
🖱️ Highlight Text: Highlight any text and press the "Get Answer" button AND START SOLVING!
OR
📸Snapshot: Drag a box around any question—whether it's a challenging math equation or a tricky multiple-choice—and get instant, detailed explanations and solutions.

Disclaimer❌: At ScholarPal, we uphold the highest standards of academic integrity and honesty. Our platform serves as a resource for students to enhance their learning experience, ScholarPal strongly encourages students to adhere to their institution's policies when utilizing ScholarPal! 

📞 Need Help?
Visit our website to learn more and contact us with any questions you may have!
